Class RuleBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Associative_Classification.ClassifierFuzzyCFAR.RuleBase

  • public class RuleBase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the representation of a Rule Set

    1.0
    Author:
